response.summary:
Scientific and social entrepreneur aiming to strengthen science, industry and education in Colombia.

I ran my first scientific startup for almost two years, and now it is time to go back to Colombia. At Capacitor Foundry, we raised over half a million dollars to test disruptive concepts in electrochemical energy storage ranging from capacitors, to batteries and electrochemical carbon capture.

As a social entrepreneur, I co-created and lead DeVolver ConCiencia, an initiative that aims to inspire Colombians in low-income parts of the country to dream big. We do it by interviewing Colombians around the world in all fields of knowledge and sharing their dreams and challenges with our audience through radio, television, and virtual events with schools.

I have also been a leadership coach since 2018 and I love seeing people grow. I have a passion for working in multicultural teams, developing healthy team dynamics, and navigating conflict.
response.skills: Liderazgo de equipos, Participación de las partes interesadas, Diversidad e inclusión, Gestión del tiempo, Nanomateriales, Hablar en público, Python, Recaudación de fondos corporativos, Relación con el cliente, Gestión de proyectos, analisis de datos, Electroquímica, Matlab, Research, Physics, Programming, Science, English, Microsoft Office, Statistics

profile_positions.description: Lead of a team of 10 Colombian professionals in all fields of knowledge who live around the World. We have organized over 40 virtual talks aimed at secondary-school students in low-income communities in 7 municipalities in Colombia. We have worked hand in hand with over 6 schools in these regions, and today we have a weekly radio show in Paez, Cauca (where I was born and raised) and a weekly TV show in Buenaventura.
profile_positions.title: Cofundador y director

profile_positions.description:
Formulated and managed research projects in electrochemical energy storage. 
Raised over half a million dollars to equip and run a laboratory for over two years. 
Planned and performed experiments around the synthesis of nanomaterials and their use in electrochemical systems.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder and Research Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Coauthored more than 8 peer reviewed papers and 2 patents.
Lead 3 graduate student groups and had leadership role in the graduate student government. 
Raised over 90.000 dollars as the lead organizer of a career, research and innovation conference for graduate students with over 200 attendees.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Experimental derivation of a mathematical model for the growth of titania nanotube arrays via anodization.
Writing of papers and proposals.
Orientation of the work of undergraduate students.
profile_positions.title: Joven Investigador - Research Assistant
